page.title: 03LANGHOLM'S COMMON RIDING
page.content: THE{COMMON RIDING}STARTS IN MAY WITH THE ELECTION OF THE{CORNET.}HE WILL LEAD THE FESTIVITIES ON COMMON RIDING DAY.ANY YOUNG UNMARRIED MAN MAY STAND FOR CORNET.ANY RESIDENT OF THE TOWN WHO IS OVER 16 MAY VOTE.THE CORNET WILL ALSO REPRESENT LANGHOLM AT OTHER COMMON RIDINGS.THE COMMON RIDING COLOURS ARE TAKEN FROM THE JOCKEY'S COLOURS OF THE HORSE WHICH WINS THE { {DERBY. }THE COMMON RIDING FESTIVITIES TAKE PLACE OVER THE LAST FORTNIGHT IN JULY.SEVERAL RIDEOUTS TAKE PLACE.THE {BENTY}RIDEOUT IS A FORTNIGHT BEFORE THE COMMON RIDING AND THE{CASTLE {CRAIGS}A WEEK BEFORE.IT IS RESTRICTED TO MALE RIDERS.COMMON RIDING DAY ITSELF IS KNOWN AS LANGHOLM'S GREAT DAY.IT BEGINS EARLY IN THE MORNING WITH THE FLUTE BAND WAKING EVERYONE UP AND ENDS WITH HANDING IN OF THE FLAG.
